description: Returning home in one of his limos, stiff executive Flavio Valentinomanually pleasures masked leatherman Chris Hacker (AKA ColinFoster), bringing him to an explosive climax. That night Flavio flip-flopfucks with hooded leatherstud Daniel Kilmer (AKA Tavish Szabad)who starts out strapped into bed.
title: Muscle Hustle, Scene #02
